name: qingping Bookstore
description:
When you were seven years old, you got lost by yourself, and when you were almost abducted by traffickers, you
Met that person, now you are eighteen years old, you have been wanting to see again for these eleven years
That person, the big sister who saved you, but she hasn't appeared for so many years,
Until you were a part-time clerk in a bookstore called "Qingping Bookshelf" during your sophomore year
start……
Game elements
After entering the plot, click to advance the plot. At the end of each plot, you will enter the match-3 game.
In a match-3 game:
Drag the grid to exchange positions, and connect three gems of the same color into a straight line to eliminate them. After reaching the specified goal.
When three or more gems of the same color form different shapes, a gem will be added with an ability when it is eliminated (the ability will be used when it is eliminated again):
1. L-shaped gems have the ability to eliminate crosses, and at the same time eliminate the gems in their ranks
2. One-line gems get horizontal elimination ability, 1-shaped gems get vertical elimination ability
3. Cross-shaped gemstones have the ability to eliminate all the same color grids together
Of course, there will also be interference from little demons, preventing you from operating this gem. The little demons will increase over time, and you need to destroy them. Some gems are harder and have shields. When they are eliminated, the shields will be eliminated instead of gems. .
There are props in the game. The props can achieve unexpected effects on gems or demons. The props can be obtained through the level, or you can buy them in the store with stars that eliminate gems.

**The text dialogue mode contains the play of elimination, which completes the elimination requirements to reach the next plot node
